Name: Approved material as per contract documents
Tag 1: Approved material as per contract documents

Name: Substrate provided as per manufacturer's requirements
Tag 1: Substrate provided as per manufacturer's requirements

Name: Blinding layer is installed
Tag 1: Blinding layer is installed

Name: Form work installed
Tag 1: Form work installed

Name: Substrates must be regular & smooth with no gaps/voids
Tag 1: Substrates must be regular and smooth with no gaps or voids greater than 12mm

Name: Preprufe installed as per GCP Work method statement
Tag 1: Preprufe installed as per GCP Work method statement

Name: Place membrane HDPE film toward concrete substrate
Tag 1: Place membrane HDPE film toward concrete substrate, ensure 75mm laps for any overlapping sheets

Name: Vertical sheets to be mechanically fixed
Tag 1: Vertical sheets to be mechanically fixed, using appropriate fasteners to substrate approximately 125mm edge of membrane, nails patched with Preprufe Tape

Name: Apply Preprufe tape/Bituthene LM to any terminations
Tag 1: Apply Preprufe tape or Bituthene LM to any terminations, cuts or fixings,

Name: Repair any punctures/burns/cuts with Preprufe Tape
Tag 1: Repair any punctures, burns or cuts with Preprufe Tape

Name: To be coordinated with relevant following trades
Tag 1: To be coordinated with relevant following trades

Name: Installed to top perimeter of pit & coated with Bituthene LM
Tag 1: Installed to top perimeter of pit and coated with Bituthene LM

Name: Set out known
Tag 1: Set out known ie extent and location of windows with respect to sill

Name: Concrete is patched & free of holes on surface
Tag 1: Concrete is patched and free of holes on surface

Name: Perform visual check of work area
Tag 1: Perform visual check of work area for:

Name: Remove dags/excessive projections interfering with membrane
Tag 1: Remove any dags or excessive projections that may interfere with the membrane

Name: Prime all surfaces with Epocote F100W Clear Primer
Tag 1: Prime all surfaces including grouted surface with Epocote F100W Clear Primer in preparation for Membrane

Name: Fill any penetrations/voids flush to ensure a continuous surface
Tag 1: Fill any penetrations / voids flush to ensure a continuous surface, apply coving fillet of Polyurethane sealant to all internal corners

Name: Membrane Application to Sill, reveals & heads
Tag 1: Membrane Application to Sill, reveals and heads – GCP Newflex at 1.5mm WFT measured using Wet Film Gauge

Name: Shower wall extents confirmed
Tag 1: Shower wall extents confirmed

Name: Shower angle location confirmed
Tag 1: Shower angle location confirmed

Name: All pipes and wastes to be grouted firm
Tag 1: All pipes and wastes to be grouted firm,

Name: Concrete Patched, Any projections ground
Tag 1: Concrete Patched, Any projections ground

Name: Positive falls to waste
Tag 1: Positive falls to waste

Name: Sheet gaps are no greater than 10mm
Tag 1: Sheet gaps are no greater than 10mm

Name: Screws, External/internal corners set
Tag 1: Screws, External/internal corners set

Name: Ensure area is dry
Tag 1: Ensure area is dry

Name: Substrate scraped free from concrete/Plaster Remove excessive projections
Tag 1: Substrate is scraped free from concrete/Plaster Remove any excessive projections that may interfere with the membrane

Name: Substrate Vacuumed/Broomed clean, smooth, firm
Tag 1: Substrate is Vacuumed/Broomed clean, smooth, firm, continuous surface and free from loose or foreign matter

Name: Prime floors, upturns & shower walls with GCP Epocote F100W
Tag 1: Prime all floors, upturns and shower walls with GCP Epocote F100W Primer or GCP Silcor Primer BS

Name: Fill penetrations/voids flush & apply Polyurethane Sealant coving fillet
Tag 1: Fill any penetrations / voids flush to ensure a continuous surface, apply coving fillet of Polyurethane Sealant to all floor/wall junctions and pipe collars

Name: Membrane installed to entire floor area at minimum 100mm turnup
Tag 1: Membrane installed to entire floor area at minimum 100mm turnup – GCP Silcor 560 HB applied in two coats at 1.75mm WFT measured using Wet Film Gauge

Name: Cast sand to form to coat for screed As per AS3740
Tag 1: Cast sand to form to coat for screed As per AS3740

Name: Membrane installed to shower walls GCP Newflex
Tag 1: Membrane installed to shower walls GCP Newflex at 1.2mm WFT measured using Wet Film Gauge As per AS3740

Name: Allow membrane to cure, check internal corners for dryness
Tag 1: Allow membrane to cure, check internal corners for dryness prior to test  Flood entire floor area for 24 hours

Name: No Visual Leaks to surrounds and soffit below
Tag 1: No Visual Leaks to surrounds and soffit below

Name: Check room for defects in the membrane
Tag 1: Check room for defects in the membrane make repairs as necessary and document

Name: Substrate is scraped free from concrete/Plaster
Tag 1: Substrate is scraped free from concrete/Plaster

Name: Prime all surfaces with Silcor Primer BS or Epocote F100W Clear Primer
Tag 1: Prime all surfaces with Silcor Primer BS or Epocote F100W Clear Primer

Name: Fill penetrations/voids flush, apply Polyurethane sealant coving fillet
Tag 1: Fill any penetrations / voids flush to ensure a continuous surface, apply coving fillet of Polyurethane sealant to all upstands and pipe collars

Name: GCP Silcor 560 HB at 1.5mm WFT measured using Wet Film Gauge
Tag 1: GCP Silcor 560 HB at 1.5mm WFT measured using Wet Film Gauge

Name: Continuous membrane over all surfaces in 1 or 2 coats
Tag 1: Continuous membrane over all surfaces in 1 or 2 coats

Name: Apply Coreflute to all surfaces receiving membrane
Tag 1: Apply Coreflute to all surfaces receiving membrane

Name: Nail only at top edge or when raising a wall, nails removed
Tag 1: Nail only at top edge or when raising a wall, nails must be removed

Name: Check surface for defects in membrane & make repairs
Tag 1: Check surface for defects in the membrane, make repairs as necessary and document

Name: QA Complete – ITP signed by relevant parties
Tag 1: QA Complete – ITP signed by relevant parties

Name: FINAL INSPECTION – check surface for defects in membrane
Tag 1: FINAL INSPECTION – check surface for defects in the membrane, make repairs as necessary
